arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Viktoria Plzen – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: AS Roma and Viktoria Plzen go head-to-head in the UEFA Europa League on Thursday night. Both sides will be searching for crucial points in the league phase, with the Giallorossi looking to bounce back from consecutive home defeats. At the same time, the Czech visitors aim to continue their unbeaten European campaign.
